title: Wukong is Gold.
body:
Most fun Champion in the game to play with the jukes. I swear whoever came up with this Champion is the coolest person in the universe and I love them for giving us a Champion that's as funny as this.

Every single time I play him and I end up in a juke fest by using decoy decoys then real decoys I just sit there laughing out loud at the enemy team roaming around and trying to cut me off; Their confusion is so entertaining.

replies.body:
... coulda posted the chat log he had about this...

"press s, walk other way... Press s, walk other way again... funniest champion"

Guess what, he logged back on, to say something about jax, I have the log now


[9:33] Talon12: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nky7VkXnQo8
you used the wrong heyayayaya
[9:33] Level1Pentakill: lol
:p
Was playing Wukong today
push le S key
[9:35] : commence laughing
take 2 steps backwards to other path and push the s key
commence laughing
W then run back the other way and commence the lolage
push S again and then walk back the other way
funniest f*cking champion
[10:25] : Jax is so strong lol

Yeah leblanc is pretty fun but Wukong has unlimited Juke potential.

You seen Shaclone and Pink Ward play Shaco?

Pink ward like literally perfectly times when his Clone is going to return to him and then Q's instantaneously and alt-clicks the clone to a target all in the space of like 0.2 seconds with his AP Shaco - literally legendary player lol.
moving around and suddenly press the S button.
